Name: Whitevale Defender
About the game: Whitevale Defender is a 2D replayable tower defense. You'll be defending the castle of Whitevale over and over against hordes of war machines. Each play through you will be advancing your defensive and economic arsenal while also honing your tower placements until you can save Whitevale for good. The war machines are approaching. Help King Theodore save the city of Whitevale from the evil King Balmek. Features Utilize tools such as traps and explosives. There are 3 tools (4 in total) to unlock to help you survive in the heat of the moment. Build mining drills to excavate minerals. There's a special tower you can unlock to improve your money flow. Which means more towers in the long run. Unlock powerful rewards that completely alter how you play. There are 14 unlockables in total from new towers, tools, and passive abilities you can take into each play through. Enjoy 4 - 10 hours of strategy fun (or more depending on your skill level). Whitevale is on the brink of destruction. King Theodore needs your help....
